    • Constructor Detail

      • Node

        public Node(java.lang.String contentLine,
    int indent,
    Node parent,
    int set)
        Constructor of the node.
        Parameters:
        contentLine - string with the node information
        indent - indent level of this node, to determine its place on the tree.
        parent - indicates the parent of the new node, if any.

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public void insert(Node node)
        Inserts a new node in the tree structure. Navigates from this node up towards the root, inserting the new node at the correct indent.
        Parameters:
        node - new node to add.
